1.content:
"Wake up John, its time to eat your breakfast!" Mary yells... You Slowly open your eyes and look at the time... it read 7:00 am.You reply back"Geez, mom its only 7 o'clock in the morning" "Don't talk back to me.. I told you today was going to be a big day and i was going to need your help." Mary yelled back. You reluctantly replied back " Fine, ill be down in a minute" with that you sat up and procedded to put on a old tshirt that you normally wear when you are home... then headed down stairs...

When you entered the kitchen your mom had a plate of pancakes, and 6 slices of bacon and a glass of orange juice already set up for you to consume.. It was a surprise for you as she usually only makes pancakes on special occasions..not only that to go as far as already making a plate for me to eat... Your mom looks at you and says " Well are you just going to stand there or are you gonna eat?" You look at her with a puzzling look thinking to your self shes usually not this nice to me except on my birthday and christmas... but you shrug it off and start to sit down in front of your meal and start eating. You then ask your mom " Why are you being so nice to me?" Mary replied " Do I need a reason to be nice to my son, besides you agreed to do this one favour for me the least I can do is make you your favourite breakfast" You then grab the glass of Orange Juice.and started to drink it.. your mom watching you intently as you drink it. You then look at your mom and say" By the way, you didnt tell me what this favour was." Your mom smiling " Youll soon find out my dear... " She was not able to finish what she saying as you are now passed out on the table...

1 hour later,

You started to open your eyes.. and look around your surroundings... You hear a female voice comming from behind you saying "Look mother hes finally waking up" you turn around seeing your sister Kate looking down at you, you fall back surprised to see that she is now huge. Kate giggles and says " Surprised little brother?" You relize after taking a look around the room noticing that you are actually standing on top of the table and you were actually barely the height of the juice glass that your standing beside.. You yell back" Why are you doing this to me?" Kate replied back" Remember that little favour you promised our mother to do? Well this is it, you are officially not our mothers problem anymore... after all the years being mean to me and my mom.. I decided to take you off our moms hands and use you as paruess i should let you know t of a little internet game show i run"

" Game show? " you ask.. Kate replied back " Yes i guess i should let you know the details... Well fist thins first you will be placed in a random spot in a huge maze... all divided up into squares much like a game board...beside each square there are also doors layed out at each square, now a internet viewer who is picked at random each day will roll 2 dice and you will be allowed to move the resulting number in any direction open to you... once you made the last move you must pick one of the doors available to you... and then the cycle will restart with another viewer rolling the dice.. " Kate stopping now noticing a look of fear in your eyes, then laughs" It gets better... now there are a total of 150 doors bwettin the maze... only 1 door will lead to your freedom of this game, you find that door and you will find your self back to normal... and hopefully for the better, there are 5 doors that will take you to a break room on where you will meet girl volenteers who are your size and all they will do is pleasure you in all kinds of ways for 1 whole day before you are back in the maze." Kate pauses then continues" However the other 144 doors will lead to a torture, that could consist of vore tortures, transformation tortures, squash tortures etc.. when you end up in one of these doors the viewer will roll one dice to determine on how long you will have to endure the torture for up to 6 days, dont worry you wont die from any of them... but im sure after some tortures you may wish for death" Kate then adds" Oh if you choose not move i wouldnt.. as there are 3 vorish dolls moving around the maze, if you get caught by one either by you not moving or running into one the doll will then pick you up and vore you... and the concequence of that would be you will go through the entire process of digestion which then you will transform into a piece of shit then you will be shit out where you will sit there for a few days slowly transforming back to normal... , oh and you have 2 weeks to find the exit door after which if you fail all the doors will change positions, not only that the current participating viewer at the time may choose to set a condition on you, ie you have to wear panties "

John yelled" You can't do this to me!" Kate replied back" Well I can because i just did... now be a good brother and help me make money." she then smiles then says" Well im going to need a way to carry you to your new home... " She then looks around then she got a evil look in her eyes. "Ahh i know what im going to do, im going to do one of the possible tortures to you while i take you to your new home, im going to ......"

You shivered in her grasp and she noticed this
"Don't be shy little one... Just do as I say and nothing bad shall happen."

She opened her mouth and licked you head to toe drenching you in her saliva
"Grrr..." she said angrily "You don't fit my taste... so I guess you're spared from my tummy"

She then outlined your body and let out another sigh "You don't feel like you'd be the best fit in my pleasure areas"

You let out a sigh of relief and said "oh... well then does that mean I'm free Goddess Olivia?" with a smug smile on your face

"No no" she said. There's still one more thing you can do for me

She placed you on floor and you immediately knew what she was going to do.
You quickly pleaded with her "Please, is there anything else I can do? I can tell already your feet smell terrible and I don't think I could survive under your feet."

She looked at you with a perplexed face...
"Well... Uh... I've never had someone plead with me before... but I think that's because no one has ever tasted as bad as you before and so I got to eat them"
You looked at her in terror
"What can I do? A girl's gotta eat"


She broke the silence "Well... I guess I could do something else... but it might be a bit worse..."
"What is it?" you ask politely

"That's the catch" she says, "You'll have to be a stain on my foot... or suffer another consequence that you'll only find out what it is when I'm about to do it to you"

"I'll let you decide" she said calmly
1311112111.title: The hand without a key.

choices: You run left
You run right
1311112112.content:
You take steps slowly towards the doll in hopes of getting the key around its neck. You come up next to it and feel its warm breath go over your face. The smell of its breath made you shutter reminding you of the few hours you spent in its tummy. You grab the key from its necklace and pull it over its head. Success! you say to yourself. You take a few steps back and turn around to admire the doll. What an odd thing you say to yourself. You use the key on the last door near the doll to see that if you went into it you would have become a stain on a giantess's foot

You dodged a bullet there, you soon notice the key that went into the lock is now gone.

You walk away out of the dead end but before you turn you hear from behind you
"By the way... my name is Julie"
You turn around to see the doll still with its eyes closed pretending to sleep talk to you.
"And you were by far the tastiest snack I've ever had" She... the dolll... Julie opened its eyes and looked at you "Just for being such a good snack I thought I'd let you have that key, but you better bet that you'll be back inside my tummy in no time. She licked her lips and rubbed her stomach in a mocking gesture.

"Anyways... see you soon I had a fun time; but next time please don't put up a fight" She winks then closes her eyes

You need to run away from this dead end...
1311112112.title: Tip-toe towards the Doll...

choices: If you think I'd listen to you, you're insane!
Yes mistress. I'll please your every whim...
131111212.content:
You flung yourself under her legs only for her to drop down and sit on the back of your head
you squirmed violently but it was no use. You slowly moved your head facing up which proved to be a bad idea because now her ass and tail were in your face.
You heard a soothing voice "Comfy down there?" it said calmly
You said something but was muffled by the doll's ass on your face


She turned around and looked down at you in-between her thighs.
"Now..." she said
"You know what happens to little boys like you who try to run away" she said giving you a boop on the nose with her paw
You looked at her in terror
"Well... I'm sure you don't like it if your food were to try and run away -- huh?"
"Now I have an idea. Do as I say and maybe I won't digest you once I eat you... don't follow and trust me you're not going to have a pleasant exit."

There was an awkward pause and she brought her thighs closer together around your head making it very tight.

"So what shall it be? Will you listen to my commands, or do we need to do things the hard way?"

What do you say?
131111212.title: Tried to roll under its legs in a desperate att...

choices: A red door with the number 14
An orange door with the letter 'T'
1311112121.content:
She looked at you angrily and tightened her thighs harder making it hard for you to talk.
"That's too bad" she said in a pout-ful voice "I thought you were pretty cute, I might have even let you go"
She stood up and grabbed your feet in-between her snout and starting slurping you into her small mouth.
You squirmed and even tried to get out of her grip
You smacked her in the face and she coughed and stopped swallowing...
You tried to escape again but your knees were already down her throat
You flipped sides to lay on your belly and started to try and crawl out
She grabbed you by the waist and started to pull her into her gullet
You felt your legs drenched in her warm saliva when only your arms and head were sticking out you looked her in the eyes as she angrily glared at you then gestured 'good bye' with her paws.
Soon your head disappeared her lips and was laying on her tongue.
She stopped slurping you into her belly and started to use her tongue to lick all of your face mockingly before doing one last gulp sending you into her belly.

You could hear her, outside of her stomach "you really hurt me there..."
you screamed back "You're not the one being eaten for Christ's sake!"
"Welcome to the food chain then. Prey shouldn't be hurting their predators!"
"I hope you feel bad for what you did out there while you sit in my tummy"
You screamed at her making her feel bad about herself

She remained quiet and no longer responded to your shouts of hate.

Soon you started to get sucked into her lower stomach passage "Oh god" you muttered to yourself as you went head first into the second stage of being eaten. Your head was the first thing to exit her body between her plump ass. You saw the light and saw right under you was the floor of the maze. You fell limp out of her and smelled terrible. You tried to move but you couldn't... you were paralyzed! After she finished exiting you from her body she turned around and stood over you.
"Well well..." she said with a victorious tone
"Looks like we see what we get when a meal tried to escape"
She put her foot onto your face rubbing it in
"You're the prey... I'm the predator get used to it. If you don't you'll just be ending up in my tummy more and more."

She then started again "Well... you should be able to get up in about ten minutes I guess. You look so pathetic. You tried to fight back and what happened to you? You just ended up plopping out of me."

"Victory smells good the top of the food chain" she kept rambling "Want to know what it smells like down there" she retorted smiling

She squated down above your face and lifted her tale about your mouth and let out a huge toot and a gust of warm air

She stood back up and looked down on you again "Anyways... I hope you didn't learn your lesson. It just means more time for you to be in my tummy"

She stomp away without looking back.

You closed your eyes and took a nice rest.
When you woke up you awoke in a diffrent spot and heard the speaker from your sister
"Now... listen here" she spoke
"Don't fight a doll... they'll just do worse and worse things to you kiddo -- next thing you know they'll just be using you to wipe their ass, and trust me I've seen them do that to someone once."

"Anyways, the game is still going. You know what to do. 2 doors next to you. Chose one."

You look at the doors...
1311112121.title: A doll's fighting snack

choices: Well then let's start, no need to waste time!
I really don't want to do this... please can we stop?
1312.content:
"Don't talk to me in that tone!" she blurted out.
"You're lucky I don't make you a stain on my foot right now mister!"
You back away slowly in fear and there is a small silence. "Well... the rules... are you going to tell me them or are we just going to have a staring contest?"
"Oh yes" she said in a suddenly calm tone

"A viewer will roll two dice, you will move that number in a direction and open a door near that spot.
There are three types of room, a torture room, a break room, and your freedom door." She said "There are also some things that I have called made called 'Vore Dolls' if you encounter one they will chase you and... 'vore' you up."

"Vore? What's that?" You said

She sighed dramatically "They'll eat you whole. Then you will... meet an unfortunate exit and have to escape from there; make sure you don't get caught by two... it will take a while until they get bored of you... or think about doing other things to you."

"Anything else I should know?" you shouted

"Nope. There are a few secrets here and there but... you'll find those yourself. And make sure you finish this fast, if you're here for too long I guess you'll just be my little slave"

You say...

13121.title: Into the game!

choices: Chooses to be eaten
Chooses to be unbirthed
Doesnt make a choice in time, therefore up Kates shithole
132.content:
While Kate was walking back to her home, she decided to stop at a washroom to give John a break from her foot... She removed her stocking that had John and gentally had John fall right into her left hand. John looks up at Kate, Kate said" You should know Mom origionally was going to make you a part of her favourite breakfast and then eat it, thinking that if you can't be a good son then you should at least be good as a part of her food" John replide back" But what your doing would kill me anyways so what would be so different" Kate replied back" Look brother, even though you been rude to me, I still care alot for you alot more than mom does for you at this point.. I did what I had to do to save you, and at the end Mom will welcome you back with open arms, knowing you will have changed your ways when this is all over." Kate paused then continued" Dont worry John I meant the truth when I said you wont die, unlike the shrinking potion Mom would of gave you, the one I had her give you also renders your body immortal, meaning no matter what you go through even full digestion, you will wake up in the same place it was done to you allowing you to continue on in the maze" John now sitting down now contempating what is being said to him, he himself admits that maybe this is for the best.

John than looks up and asks"How long average does someone go through this maze?" Kate looks down and answers "An average person takes 5 weeks, people usually take too long the first time around, however mom did set a condition, if you are still in the maze by the time Mom's birthday in 6 months, she does not want you back, meaning you will then be permanently trapped in the maze, as you see I put a special bracelt on you that is glowing green." John looks at his wrist and sees the bracelet which also sported a timer.. Kate continued" The timer will run till the day of moms birthday, until that time the bracelet will keep glowing green. The exit door will only open and allow those whos bracelet is still green through, Once it turns red any attempt to open the door will cause the maze to reset." John looking at Kate and said"But, you said..." Kate interupted" Look brother, While I do care for you, I can't see that being true should you let our Mom down by not competing the maze before her birthday, infact to send you a message on that day should you not make it out, she already reserved a play spot for that day, and if her turn makes you end up on a punishment spot or you end up in the hands of a vore doll, you will be put though that punishment for every year you been bad, which by my count is 10 years. Imagine being trapped in a vore dolls belly then being slowly and painfully converted to mush, then formed into a log of shit, with all that being done in a course of 10 years." John's face had the look of fear. Kate said"Don'rt worry, while i cant make it obvious ill leave you suttle hints of where the exit is."

Kate then said" Well its time to be on our way, but first to put you somewhere different, i think after all this talk about vore, I am going to put you inside me the rest of the way, dont worry though ill give you something to make the first experience painless, and guess what... Ill let you choose.. either I eat you like I would a piece of food... or I insert you into my womb, your choice, but take to long and Ill put you in my shithole."

John .......
132.title: 3 hours later Kate Decided to give John a Break...

choices: You do nothing, in fear of a punishment
You scream for help hoping to get the attention of your sister
Crawl out of her stocking and boot to the outside world
133.content:
You hear her open the door to your new home and she starts to stomp around the place making sure to rub her smelly foot into you as much. You notice that she is not letting you out of her stocking and that you are still trapped with your face being smushed by the soles of her foot.You hear her voice through the walls of the jail you are in which is her foot.

You hear a treadmill start up and soon painful stomps from her foot push you further and further into her foot. The air starts to smell of sweat. You start to scream for help only to hear your sisters laugh vibrate through her boot. She takes one more large step and you are squished out of consciousness.

When you wake up you are in her sweaty, foul smelling boot and stocking; aching all over.
You know you are at your destination... but your sister hasn't told you to do anything

What do you do?
133.title: An extended stay...

info.brief_description: You are shrunk and given to your sister for her to torture you
info.description:
Your John a 18 year old who is very mean towards your mother and your sister..

Your mom Mary had enough of your attitude and decides to get rid of you by shrinking you and giving you to your sister Kate for her to do whatever she feels necessary..
Kate as your older sister who was quite successful, you know that by the fact she seems to making alot of money even though you don't know what it is... but you will soon find out.....


Rules
no 1 line chapters...
no killing (as part of the shrinking process it renders the victim immortal) but feel free to put the character in as many situations as you can think of even ones that would normally kill a person
and have fun...
